collectionMetadata.name: IRAS’ Collection by Tax Type, Annual
collectionMetadata.description: Total amount of taxes collected by IRAS with a breakdown by tax type for Financial Year (FY)2002 to FY2022. IRAS' tax collections include Corporate Income Tax, Individual Income Tax, Withholding Tax, Goods and Services Tax, Property Tax, Stamp Duty, Betting Taxes and Estate Duty.

datasetMetadata.name: IRAS' Collection By Tax Type
datasetMetadata.description:
* Property tax collection was higher in FY2011/12 due to the cessation of the Property Tax Deferral for Land Approved for Development on 21 January 2011 which resulted in the deferred property tax being collected in FY2011/12.
* Betting Taxes include Betting Duty, Private Lotteries Duty and Casino Tax (with effect from March 2010). 
* Estate Duty has been removed for deaths occuring on or after 15 February 2008.
